attributes.action: force himself to answer the questions in prime minsters questions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any person that watches PMQ's will know that Gordon Brown has not once, NOT ONCE has answered a question. In My opinion he should be forced by to answer the question and if the person who asks the question is not happy that the question has been answered he should be made to keep trying to answer the question.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
